name: Clashing Raimo
description:
CLASHING RAIMO
Jump, sprint and punch across various landscapes to rescue your friend!

Your dearest friend Lessly has been kidnapped by an unknown army of rogue robots! Obviously, Raimo isn't gonna stay arms-crossed waiting for some help from a grown up (specially in an island found in the middle of nowhere), so be ready since he won't give up without a fight! With the help of some friendly bots, you'll have to make your way towards the main robot stronghold by jumping across jungles, sprinting through ruined ruins, punching your way out of underground mazes and more! (Psst, you may even find some useful treasure if you explore long enough!) Beware everyone because he's not just a kid named Raimo, he's a CLASHING RAIMO!Players: 1

Any similarities towards an existing franchise may or may not be intentional.

Game controls:
WASD / Arrow keys: General movement
Enter: Pause game / Confirm selection (Title Screen)
Shift: Change selection (Title Screen)
Z / N: Sprint / Turbo (Ship level)
X / M: Punch
F1: Enable / Disable fullscreen
